MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH44 postcode area of Innerleithen. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 5:00pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Caerlee House Substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:01pm on Monday, 11th January 2021.
